snippet: The real estate investor Joseph Chetritis is considering converting the 37-story tower on Madison Avenue into a luxury hotel and a retail arcade, real estate executives said.
abstract: Real estate investor Joseph Chetrit leads consortium signing contract to pay $1.1 billion for Sony Building on Madison Avenue at 55th Street in Manhattan; Chetrit indicates possible plans for a luxury condominium and hotel conversion.
lead_paragraph: The real estate investor Joseph Chetritis is considering converting the 37-story tower on Madison Avenue into a luxury hotel and a retail arcade, real estate executives said.

headline.seo: $1.1 Billion Deal Is Reached to Buy Sony Building
